淸字的基本解释

淸
qīng
同“清”。

淸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qīng］
“清1”的旧字形。
[②]［qìng］
“清2”的旧字形。

淸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页632第15
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【正韻】七情切【集韻】【韻會】親盈切，?音圊。【說文】朖也。澂水之貌。【釋名】淸，靑也。去濁遠穢，色如靑也。【詩·鄭風】瀏其淸矣。　又靜也，澄也，潔也。【書·舜典】直哉惟淸。　又水治曰淸。【詩·小雅】泉流旣淸。　又視淸明也。【詩·鄘風】子之淸揚。【註】視淸明曰淸。又【齊風】猗嗟名兮，美目淸兮。【傳】目上爲名，目下爲淸。　又酒名。【周禮·天官·酒正】辨四飮之物，一曰淸。【註】淸謂醴之泲者。　又凡飮皆曰淸。【周禮·天官·膳夫】凡王之饋飮，用六淸。　又水名。【山海經】太時之山，淸水出焉。【水經】淸水，出河南修武縣北黑山。　又江名。【廣輿記】淸江，在臨江府城南。　又河名。【水經注】白溝水東北過廣宗縣，東爲淸河。　又邑名。【春秋·隱四年】夏公及宋公遇于淸。【註】淸，衞邑。【詩·鄭風】淸人在彭。【正義】淸，鄭邑。　又姓。宋有進士淸賢。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?疾郢切，音靜。潔也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?疾正切，音淨。與瀞同。　又【集韻】【

淸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
淸字的起名意思

同“清”。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　淸; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 632 15
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Seven Emotions and Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Kind and warm,? Sound. [Said the text] Ye Ye. The appearance of the river. 【Release Name】Chang, Qian Ye. To go muddy and far filthy, the color is as beautiful. 【Poetry·Zheng Feng】Look at Qi Jing.　 Quiet again, Cheng Ye, Jie Ye. [Book·Shun Code] Naoya Weichen.　Shuizhi said and said Cheung. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Spring is flowing.　I looked at Ming Ming again. 【Poetry·Fengfeng】The rise of the son. 【Note】Looking at Cheung Ming said Cheung. Also 【Qi Feng】The name is Xi, and the beautiful eyes are fascinating. 【Biography】The first name is the name, and the current name is 淸.　Also the name of the wine. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Jiuzheng】Distinguish the things of the four foods, one is 淸. [Note] The one who is called Lizhi.　Everything is said to be 淸. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Sinfu】The feed of all kings, using Liuqi.　Also known as water. [Shanhaijing] The mountains of the time of the time, the water flows out of Yan. [Shui Jing] Cheongshui, out of Beihei Mountain, Xiuwu County, Henan.　Also Jiang name. [Guang Yu Ji] Songjiang, south of Linjiangfu.　Also the name of the river. [Shuijing Note] Baigou River passes through Guangzong County in the northeast, and the east is the Cheong River.　Also known as the town. [Spring and Autumn·Hidden Four Years] Gong Xia and Gong Song met Yu Chen. [Note] Cheung, Wei Yi. 【Poetry·Zheng Feng】Cheongren is in Peng. [Justice] Cheung, Zheng Yi.　Another last name. Song You Jinshi Cheongxian.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Cut quickly, the sound is quiet. Jie also.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? The disease is tangent, and the sound is clean. Same as Solo.　又【Jiyun】【
